title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained CLI and server for running Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS/Linux/Windows with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, structured output.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, uploads, RAG, admin).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; sync/async, fluent API, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete, copy, show.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and conversation management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-like inline completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using ollama-js and Vercel AI SDK; one-click deploy template.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, RAG, fine-tune, LangGraph, Autogen, etc.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple Streamlit app to chat with local PDFs using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads; supports slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama service in CI pipelines for integration testing with LLMs.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models in any channel.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama; async HTTP, SSE streaming, native JSON marshalling.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes, templates, or dataview scripts via Ollama.
